title: How to make your own beats - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all you have to really want to make beats, like it can be fun but you should have some kind of passion about music, that’s all you need really. Next get a you a laptop/computer and get a DAW(Digital Audio Worstation) My suggestion is FL studio because that’s what i use and it hasn’t disappointed me in 14 years. Most or all the major DAW’s come with free inbuilt/ stock sounds that should get you started and build inspiration from there as you go along you would either get better or stop doing it. People usually say you must know how to play an instrument, but i run a successful side business selling beats online and i don’t play any instruments.There are no rules to making beats just have good ears, listen for new things on the radio and attempt making them pay attention and be smart. Good luck

Thanks for the a2a! I’d say start with something simple: using a pre-recorded sound you like and adding in another sound you like. Software like GarageBand will be a way to start, although you can search for “free music making software” online or “free beatmaking software” over time you’ll learn what sounds good together and will make better sounding music. if you take lessons on an instrument or for voice this will help. If you get lessons and/or collaborate on beat making this will help too Lastly I’d ask: why do you want to make beats? There are many free beats for you to use online if you’re looking to write lyrics and/or sing lf creative expression is what you’re after then good luck!
